name: 肿胀 (Live)
lyric:
译：陈粒
音乐总监：荒井十一
制作人：荒井十一
编曲：冯翰铭 / 苏道哲
计算机编程：冯翰铭/苏道哲
鼓：荒井十一
钢琴 / 键盘：冯翰铭
吉他：顾忠山
贝斯：Damien Banzigou
大提琴：宋昭
音响设计：王凯
现场录音：王雷 / 赛汉
音乐编辑：倪涵文 / 李卓 / 李宗远 / 茆博文 / 荒井十一
混音：周天澈
母带处理：Joe LaPorta

All I see is gold
It's private
It can't be shared
Nothing but be bold

You dig
And you're aware
Shooting across the sky makes me satisfied
But when I swell my brain is so unfed

All I see is gold
It's private
It can't be shared
Nothing but be bold

You dig
And you're aware
Shooting across the sky makes me satisfied

But when I swell my brain is so unfed
The sky bends into a circle

A hole
The earth bends into a circle
A hole
Shooting across the sky makes me satisfied

But when I swell my brain is so unfed
The sky bends into a circle

A hole
The earth bends into a circle
A hole
